title: Defensiveness

en: Hey, #NAME. I decided to meet up in person again for this conversation, because it's important you understand what I'm saying.
You're defensive with some of the criticism I'm offering. I understand I can be harsh, but you need to be able to handle criticism without reacting in anger or retreating from your responsibilities.
This is something that's going affect your work for the rest of your life. You can't hide from it. Please figure out how to handle it.

no_caption: I'm not defensive. I'm setting a boundary

en: Thank you. I hope things will go more easily in the future.
Mhmm. Have I made my point? Please find a way to handle this. It's non-negotiable.
